'''Radiant Spincrystal 99''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Ballad of Many Waters]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to the [[Alchemy|Alchemy Table]] in the [[Court of Fontaine]], [[Fontaine]].
